title: Opening of the International Workshop on Social Web Mining 2011

author: Ricard Gavalda, Departament de Llenguatges i Sistemes Informàtics, Technical University of Catalonia

segmentation: So welcome everybody in the name of.
Ashing Wahoo's here and myself Ricarda.
Two of the organizers I would like to welcome welcome you all to Barcelona to Sky, and in particular to this workshop, which we hope we're going to enjoy.

The first workshop of this series, as far as I know, at least with this name, of course, have been events with similar topic, and we hope that we set some kind of reasonable starting point for topic that we think is is hot.
I think we have started well with a good number of submissions and good number of acceptive papers, and with tremendously good invited.
Speaker so I think that we should be very honored by that.
So thank you all for coming.
Thanks to all the people that have contributed to it.
Authors to the program committee.
So I would like to mention the Pascal to network of excellence.
Who is helping us with funding and the organization in particular with the video recording.
Will talk about video recording in a moment.
And well, let's see.
We hope let me just mention the four invited speakers whom I should actually you know what is my name?
Ricardo eights from Yahoo Research, Bhaskar Meta from Google you learn bangle from Microsoft Research and Xiangyang from Hong Kong, University of Science.
As you have seen and I will see later, we have a scheduled one of the invited talk in the morning and three of the invited talks in the afternoon.
Because basically of.
Speaker constraints.
I will not read the program committee allowed it to about.
20 people that were extremely high.
Hopefully, in evaluating their submissions, and I think very good work.
And finally, let me mention the two Co organizer who are not here Francesco Bonchi and Ribon time for personal and professional reasons cannot attend.
Again, let me make sure Shambo who I have to say I really have to say harness Lee has been the driving force and the guy who has done most of the work for these workshops.
So it's been quite amazing.
Working in this time, so I want to thank sharing more specially.
About the video recording as I say thanks to Pascal, we are recording all the lectures that all the.
Dogs that want to be recorded and they help you know these video lectures.
Serious.
Fantastic system where you have synchronized recordings and the slides.
In order to have your dressing the speakers in order to have your talk and slides available at the video lecture site, you'll need to sign for us.
Some return permit form.
Unfortunately, I don't have copies here, will have them in an hour or so, but please make sure that you sign if you agree to have your talk in the system.
If you don't want to be recorded, that's OK also, but.
If you want to be in the system you need, we need you to sign these this form right?
Thanks, thanks again.
Let me review briefly how the program looks like.
We have 7 accepted papers except that one of them was merged with one of the invited talks.
Will be there will be essentially 6 papers presented this morning.
We will have five papers presented becausw the paper by Tony White Ash in both mentioned he cannot attend for some personal emergency.
Had to leave so we will have first set of two papers, sorry.
Then we'll make some short breaks for skipping this talk just so that someone who had planned in case someone had planned to arrive at this time for this paper, doesn't miss them right?
Follow the coffee break, then invited talk by Shang Yang.
Lunch is at one.
This is pretty late for most of you I guess, but this is early actually for Spanish standards.
And then in the afternoon we have 3 three invited talks, followed by some ending discussion.
OK.
